alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Putnam; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 8:17PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Putnam, southeastern Whiteside and central Bureau Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 816 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Walnut, or 13 miles northwest of Princeton, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Princeton, DePue, Bureau Junction, Hennepin, Spring Valley and Granville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Illinois between mile markers 52 and 69. Interstate 180 between mile markers 1 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
